start:
Dear travelling wizard,

We welcome you to our Wool Industry City as the first intelligent member of the sheep species.

Nothing stands in the way of your desire for woolly living space - apart from the neighbouring buildings of the Spinning Mill Syndicate and the "Yarntastic" Conglomerate.

We ask that you use your skills to meet the growing need for close-knit and species-appropriate shelter for [b]400[/b] of your fellow sheep.

Our hopes (and your visa) rest on your shoulders.

Yours sincerely,

The Town Council
Woolhio, New Yarn
first_warning:
Hello to our Woolly Wizard,

we love your carefully constructed cabins, yet we could not help but notice a bothersome predicament:

Please ensure to make sufficient space for the arriving array of additional sheep. We trust you will accommodate our arrangement.

Friendly greetings,

The Town Council
Woolhio, New Yarn
second_warning:
Dear wizard,

with heavy hearts we heard of herds of homeless, helpless sheep.

We would advise our woolly wizard to take it up a notch - all the way up, in fact.

Consider this consultation carefully, as our cooperation could conclude if worse comes to worst.

With a warning word to the wise,

The Town Council
Woolhio, New Yarn
third_warning:
With woeful warning words to our woolly wizard,

on our previous papers we put careful consideration into your counceling, yet it seems that our words would not work as motivational messages.

Hereby the Woolhio City Council wants to warn you one last time to accommodate more shelter for sheep, as further violations warrant drastic disposessions.

The Town Council,
Woolhio, New Yarn
game_over:
To our traveling troublemaker,

EVICTION NOTICE

It seems like you could not satisfy the quality standards that our [s]livestock[/s] precious sheep require for optimal wool growth and population expansion.

Your measly [b]%d[/b] story building is dwarfed by structures like our Shears-Tower, and could only accommodate a total of [b]%d[/b] animals.

We expected better, and the council has decided to sever it's [s]yarn[/s] ties with you.

The Town Council
Woolhio, New Yarn
win:
To our city's perfect builder,

you succeeded in placing plenty, pretty quarters to accommodate all the sheep we can come up with in current circumstances.

We thank you heartly for your enourmous efforts, and congratulate you on coming this far.

There's no need for additional domiciles, but nothing is stopping you from exploring the limits and expanding linearly.

With congratulory greetings,

The Town Council
Woolhio, New Yarn
good_ending:
To the Woolly Wizard that wrapped up the impossible,

it is time to conclude the complex condo, as you have indeed approached the limits of all things possible.

We thank you for the time and effort invested into this beautiful building, and invite you to come back and try again at any time.

Your building has surpassed a staggering [b]%d[/b] stories, unmatched for any of its kind.

Yours truly,

The Town Council
Woolhio, New Yarn
